overview:
Kevin is a practicing physician with a passion to change the way the people approach their health and healthcare.

His vision is to create a healthier world by transforming the healthcare delivery paradigm to one of managing health rather than disease. With increasing rates of preventable conditions and the vast majority of our healthcare dollars paying for the management of these conditions and there associated complications costs will continue to rise despite current efforts at reforming the delivery system.

It is time for the individual to take responsibility for their own health and Kevin is working on ways to help people make better health choices though the use of entertaining platforms. He understands what motivates people and how to leverage technology, behavioral science and gaming to engage and help create a healthier population.

His unique skills and understanding of our healthcare system combined with exciting new knowledge of how people make decision has led to the development of NeuFit. A social platform that drives a cultural change towards healthier living and an active life style. Th platform feeds real world player activities from devices into compelling, high quality game environments that encourage players to get and stay active. His work is a game changer in the future of Health!
